argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | latidm.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | latidm.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> K e. Lat ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_latjcl | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .\/ X ) e. B ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .\/ X ) e. B ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> X e. B ) |
| 8 | 1, 3 | #P_latref | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> X ( le ` K ) X ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_latjle12 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ X e. B /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( ( X ( le ` K ) X /\ X ( le ` K ) X ) <-> ( X .\/ X ) ( le ` K ) X ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 7, 7, 7, 9 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( ( X ( le ` K ) X /\ X ( le ` K ) X ) <-> ( X .\/ X ) ( le ` K ) X ) ) |
| 11 | 8, 8, 10 | #P_mpbi2and | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .\/ X ) ( le ` K ) X ) |
| 12 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_latlej1 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B /\ X e. B ) -> X ( le ` K ) ( X .\/ X ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_3anidm23 | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> X ( le ` K ) ( X .\/ X ) ) |
| 14 | 1, 3, 4, 6, 7, 11, 13 | #P_latasymd | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ X e. B ) -> ( X .\/ X ) = X ) |
